duties_responsibilities.duty: Scrub in multiple services as needed
Collaborate with Specialty Nurse to ensure proper equipment, supplies, and surgical setup
Precept and mentor students, technicians, and nurses in scrub roles
Act as a primary technical resource for assigned services or programs
Provide assistance during surgical procedures and post-procedure cleanup
Handle specimens according to hospital guidelines and policy
Support patient care activities under the direction of the RN Circulator
Assemble and check supplies, equipment, and instrumentation before procedures
Maintain surgical counts for sponges, needles, and instruments
Participate actively in the surgical team's 'Time Out' process for safety

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an accredited surgical technician program
Successful completion of Operating Room orientation within 6 months of hire
American Heart Association (AHA) BLS certification (must be maintained throughout employment)
Certified Surgical Technologist (CST) certification highly preferred
